name: BouncyCube
description:
BouncyCube is my first project and the result of  watching the Unity Beginner Tutorial of  Brackeys and messing a little with the code.

BouncyCube is only an Android app because the test showed that the export to other platforms don't go that well.

For now theres only one Level with has not really an end and resets the Level if you go to far in any direction . The not clear goal is it to go forward to the end of the plane, although you don't get regretted if you do so and simply get set back if you fall of the forwarding site of the plane.

Steuerung:

Holding a finger on the touchscreen in the direction in with you want to move
